name: The Magic of Thinking Big
description: The Magic of Thinking Big teaches readers how to set their goals high and think positively to achieve them.

name: The Alchemist
description: The Alchemist is a story about following your dreams and the treasure you find when you do.

name: The Power of Now
description: The Power of Now emphasizes living in the present moment as the path to happiness and enlightenment.

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
description: Rich Dad Poor Dad shares lessons on personal finance and investing from the author's two 'dads'.

name: The Power of Positive Thinking
description: The Power of Positive Thinking encourages readers to be optimistic and believe in themselves.

name: The Happiness Advantage
description: The Happiness Advantage explains how positive psychology can improve your performance and lead to success.

name: Think and Grow Rich
description: Think and Grow Rich provides a philosophy for success and personal achievement.
